org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity

Class UserStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JDOSupport<User>
      • org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity.UserStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserStoreAPI, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService

    @ManagedResource(objectName="Taverna:group=Server-3.1.0,name=Users",
                 description="The user database.")
public class UserStore
extends JDOSupport<User>
implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService, UserStoreAPI
    The bean class that is responsible for managing the users in the database.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
 @ManagedAttribute(description="The list of server accounts known about.",
                  currencyTimeLimit=30)
public List<String> getUserNames()
        Description copied from interface: UserStoreAPI
        List the currently-known account names.
        Specified by:
        getUserNames in interface UserStoreAPI
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • addUser

        @CallTimeLogger.PerfLogged
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
 @ManagedOperation(description="Create a new user account; the account will be disabled and non-administrative by default. Does not create any underlying system account.")
 @ManagedOperationParameters(value={@ManagedOperationParameter(name="username",description="The username to create."),,})
public void addUser(String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String password,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          boolean coupleLocalUsername)
        Description copied from interface: UserStoreAPI
        Create a new user account; the account will be disabled and non-administrative by default. Does not create any underlying system account.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface UserStoreAPI
        Parameters:
        username - The username to create.
        password - The password to use.
        coupleLocalUsername - Whether to set the local user name to the 'main' one.
